title: My Ding-A-Ling (w/ Dan Perlman & Kareem Green)
description:
Kareem Green and Dan Pearlman from Flatbush Misdemeanors on Showtime join The Bonfire! The gang talks about their shared love of awkward comedy and discuss the infamous leaked Chuck Berry Sex Tape. You can see Dan and Kareem on both seasons of Flatbush Misdemeanors available for streaming now on Showtime, Hulu, and Amazon Prime!

Stream "The Bonfire with Big Jay Oakerson & Dan Soder" for 3 months free on the SiruisXM app! Offer Details Apply: www.SiriusXM.com/Bonfire

Follow us on all social media @TheBonfireXM

@DanSoder www.DanSoder.com

@BigJayOakerson www.BigJayOakerson.com

@DanJPerlman www.danperlmancomedy.com

@KareemGreen21 www.kareemgreencomedy.com
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Kareem Green, Dan Perlman)
